feed.title: Gull Island Rapids (Trans-Labrador Hwy) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Gull Island Rapids (Trans-Labrador Hwy)
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 21. POP 40%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early this afternoon. 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 21. Wind chill minus 33 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 30. Wind chill near minus 36. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 60%
